response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. Given its high value and quality, I believe it's worth more than what others are willing to pay. For you, considering its worth of $150, I propose a special introductory price of $120. This is a great opportunity to secure an excellent deal on a product that truly meets your needs and expectations. Please let me know if this offer suits you, and we can proceed with the transaction.", "product_price": 120}
